title: Segmented control: UX example
code:
<gds-flex align-items="center" justify-content="center" padding="xl">

<gds-segmented-control value="bank">
  <gds-segment value="bank">Bank account</gds-segment>
  <gds-segment value="ekot">Ekot account</gds-segment>
  <gds-segment value="bankgiro">Bankgiro/plusgiro</gds-segment>
</gds-segmented-control>
</gds-flex>
